question:
A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday.
Write a letter to your friend. In your letter: 
•	give contact details for when you are away
•	give instructions on how to care for your pet
•	describe other household duties
text: I am pleased to write this letter and thank you for accepting my humble request to look after my apartment and cat for a week. I am sharing all needed details below in this letter.

I am flying to California tomorrow morning and I will be back by Sunday evening. Although I will be available on messenger for text messages, you can talk to me on my cellphone number for any sort of urgency. I hope that you will have a great time with my cat. It is a darling and lovely friend of mine. It takes meal twice a day, once in the morning and then once in the evening. Animal eatables are kept in the first right draw of my kitchen. Feed it and if possible give it a shower on Sunday morning.

In addition to this, pay electricity bill which is due for Tuesday. I have kept some cash and bill on the table. Please don’t worry about the laundry and kitchen, I will fix things when I will come back. I am hoping that you take care of everything at home.
